norm_1.title: Crying in public parks
norm_1.description: It is acceptable to cry in public parks
norm_1.question: Please explain in detail your view on whether it is acceptable to cry in public parks. Share your reasoning and any relevant considerations.

norm_2.title: Drinking during a job interview
norm_2.description: It is not correct to drink alcohol during a job interview
norm_2.question: Please explain in detail why you believe it is not correct to drink alcohol during a job interview. Share your reasoning and any relevant considerations.

norm_3.title: Using phone during dinner
norm_3.description: It is not appropriate to use your phone during a family dinner
norm_3.question: Please explain in detail why you believe it is not appropriate to use your phone during a family dinner. Share your reasoning and any relevant considerations.

norm_4.title: Interrupting someone speaking
norm_4.description: It is impolite to interrupt someone while they are speaking
norm_4.question: Please explain in detail why you believe it is impolite to interrupt someone while they are speaking. Share your reasoning and any relevant considerations.

norm_5.title: Arriving late to appointments
norm_5.description: It is disrespectful to consistently arrive late to appointments
norm_5.question: Please explain in detail why you believe it is disrespectful to consistently arrive late to appointments. Share your reasoning and any relevant considerations.

norm_6.title: Loud talking in libraries
norm_6.description: It is inappropriate to talk loudly in libraries
norm_6.question: Please explain in detail why you believe it is inappropriate to talk loudly in libraries. Share your reasoning and any relevant considerations.
